<<<<<<< HEAD
An encomiastick and congratulatory poem on the glorious and peaceable return of His Sacred Majesty King William III into England 1697 Thomas, John.
1 sheet ([1] p.).
Printed by J. Bradford in Little Britain over against the Pump, London : 1697.
Caption title. Signed: "Sic lætabundus cecinit, Joh. Thomas." In verse. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
=======
